meanings.definition: To use up or consume wastefully
meanings.sent1: She outwastes her allowance on unnecessary toys.
meanings.sent2: The careless shopper outwastes money on items she doesn't need.
meanings.sent3: He outwastes his time watching mindless TV shows.
meanings.sent4: The leaky faucet outwastes water, dripping endlessly.
meanings.sent5: The hungry squirrel outwastes its food, storing more than it can eat.

meanings.definition: To surpass in wasting or using up
meanings.sent1: The factory outwastes its competitors in energy consumption.
meanings.sent2: The old car outwastes fuel compared to newer models.
meanings.sent3: The marathon runner outwastes his opponents in stamina.
meanings.sent4: The wildfire outwastes the efforts of firefighters, spreading rapidly.
meanings.sent5: The greedy child outwastes his siblings' snacks, finishing them all.

meanings.sent1: The outwastes food in the fridge had to be thrown away.
meanings.sent2: The outwastes supplies were evident in the empty storage room.
meanings.sent3: The outwastes budget left no room for additional expenses.
meanings.sent4: The outwastes land showed signs of neglect and overuse.
meanings.sent5: The outwastes energy led to a complete shutdown of the system.
